fact: Japan has more than 5 million vending machines.
Brazil is home to the world's largest rainforest, the Amazon.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
India is the world’s largest democracy.
Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.
The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only remaining ancient wonder of the world.
Norway introduced salmon sushi to the Japanese in the 1980s.
South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Cape Town, and Bloemfontein.
Italy has more UNESCO World Heritage sites than any other country.
